title: League account age
body: Is Riot ever going to add a way for players to check the age of a league account or no?

replies.body: What if you don't have the original email or email account and forgot how old your account is since that may be a recovery question?

Account creation date is something we consider to be a part of your personal information, so I don't believe that will ever be made public information. We aren't able to list it on your account either, since someone could have access to that information once they have access to your account.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=jnkWRvvx,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-14T22:37:21.008+0000)
>
> We aren't able to list it on your account either, since someone could have access to that information once they have access to your account.

that sounds stupid to me. sounds like "to find out how old your account is, you should keep the registration e-mail, but you should delete it, because if someone gets access to your mails, he has access to this e-mail"

you could at least implement a button to send you a mail with the date ...
Is there any chance in the future of us being able to access? for us personally only with our account information?

We won't be able to give that kind of info out, but there are a couple ways you should be able to figure it out on your own! You should have gotten an email when you first signed up. If you can look for that email, it should have been sent on the day that you signed up! I hope that helps! ^_^

dont think so. its one of the questions they ask if you want to recover it. if they told it on the account it would be easyer for hackers or phishers to actually claim the account completly for themself.
